summary: DUNMETH PASS IS ALMOST FINISH JUST NEED A LITTLE HERE AND THERE AND IT NEED NAVMESH, DEADEND CAVE HALF FINISH JUST NEED TO ADD A WAY BACK THROUGH, VELOTHI MOUNTAINS OVER HALF FINISH JUST NEED THE LITTLE DETAILS, DON'T KNOW WHEN I WILL FINISH IT OR IF I WILL CONTINUE IT, LET ME KNOW WHAT YOU LOT THING AND I MIGHT CONTINUE THE MOD.
descriptionHtml:
DUNMETH PASS IS ALMOST FINISH JUST NEED A LITTLE HERE AND THERE AND IT NEED NAVMESH, DEADEND CAVE HALF FINISH JUST NEED TO ADD A WAY BACK THROUGH, VELOTHI MOUNTAINS OVER HALF FINISH JUST NEED THE LITTLE DETAILS, DON'T KNOW WHEN I WILL FINISH IT OR IF I WILL CONTINUE IT, LET ME KNOW WHAT YOU LOT THING AND I MIGHT CONTINUE THE MOD.

DESCRIPTION

Unofficial Knights of the Nine plug-in uncover what happened to the Nine after oblivion

ONLY A CHAMPION PURE OF HEART CAN RECLAIM THE LOST RELICS OF THE DIVINE CRUSADER , RETURN THE NINE TO GLORY.

LOCATION

Head to Dunmeth Pass North East of Windhelm, time is of the essence.

VERSION 0.1

Add New Area Dunmeth Pass With a Nordic Tomb With Puzzles/ Imperial tower /Hidden Cave
Add New Area Velothi Mountains with a Guard House/ Stables/ Houses and a Castle with lots of secrets and can be YOUR if you wait it
Add New Armor / Weapons / Rings and Amulets
Add Lots of New Books

VERSION 0.2

__________________
___________________
___________________
___________________
___________________


RECOMMENDATIONS


Add bBorderRegionsEnabled=0 in the [General] section in Skyrim.ini.

go to Documents/My Games/skyrim/skyrim .configuration settings. and copy bBorderRegionsEnabled=0

This will remove the Border around skyrim

RECOMMENDATIONS DOWNLOADS

Conan Reworked Music at http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49781/?" by muhfukka

MODS NEEDED TO PLAY KNIGHTSRETURN

PERMISSION RESOURCE

Knights of the Nine by maty743 at http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18114 thank you for letting me use your great armor

QUOTE
Last updated at 16:08, 25 Nov 2012 Uploaded at 15:33, 13 Jun 2012 Sorry guys, the mod is dead, I do not have time to do this and realized that to make a mod work properly is very difficult for someone inexperienced like me, then you better leave it to someone who knows what do doing this.

If someone want to continue these items, use or improve what I did to feel more comfortable without asking permission.
